About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what i do...

YOUR PROJECT IS IN SAFE HANDS

I liked computer games as a kid, and wanted to make my own. I heard computers are a good career too, so I went to university in computer science. Once I was there I developed interest in Web Developing. Now i am in final year of Engineering, I love working with people to do things bigger than I could accomplish alone. I’m motivated by big problems, and I think you’ve got something here that I can help you solve !
